title: Evaluate/Design a DocSet using Lucene RoaringIdDocSet
description: Per discussion in SOLR-9764 Design a memory efficient DocSet if a query returns all docs, Lucene RoaringIdDocSet can be memory efficient in a smart way, at the cost of some extra cpu cycles depending on use case and may be a good choice for some use cases. This JIRA is to evaluate and design a DocSet to take advantage of Lucene RoaringIdDocSet and understand the trade off.
